Arghyrou, M.G. and A. Kontonikas (2012), The EMU Sovereign-Debt Crisis: Fundamentals, Expectations and Contagion, Journal of International Financial Markets, Institutions & Money, 22: 658-677.
Berger, W. and H. Wagner (2005), Interdependent Expectations and the Spread of Currency Crises, IMF Sta¤ Papers, 52: 41-54.
Blueschke, D. and R. Neck (2011), Core and Periphery in a Monetary Union: A Macroeconomic Policy Game,International Advances in Economic Research, 17: 334-346.

Blueschke, D. and R. Neck (2012), Monetary and Fiscal Policies in a Dynamic Game Model of the EMU, in Lacina, L., P. Rozmahel and A. Rusek, Eurozone and Its Neighbors: The Third Year of Crisis, Martin Stritz Publishing, Bucovice: 57-76.
Borgy V., T. Laubach, J.-S. Mésonnier and J.-P. Renne (2012), Fiscal Sustainability, Default Risk and Euro Area Sovereign Bond Spreads, Banque de France Documents de Travail, No. 350.
Buiter, W.H., G. Corsetti and P.A. Pesenti (2001), Financial Markets and European Monetary Cooperation: The Lessons of the 1992-93 Exchange Rate, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, U.K.

Canofari, P., G. Marini and G. Piersanti (2014b), Expectations and Systemic Risk in EMU Government Bond Spreads, Quantitative Finance, DOI: 10.1080/14697688.2014.968606.

Canofari, P., G. Di Batolomeo and G. Piersanti (2014c), Theory and Practice of Contagion in Monetary Unions: Domino E¤ects in EMU Mediterranean Countries, International Advances in Economic Research, 20: 259-267.
De Grauwe, P. (2012a), The Governance of a Fragile Eurozone,Australian Economic Review, 45: 255-268.
De Grauwe, P. (2012b), In Search of Symmetry in the Eurozone, CEPS Policy Briefs, No. 268.
De Santis, R.A. (2014), The Euro Area Sovereign Debt Crisis: Identifying Flight-To-Liquidity and the Spillover Mechanisms,Journal of Empirical Finance, 26: 150-170.
Favero, C.A. (2013), Modelling and Forecasting Government Bond Spreads in the Euro Area: A GVAR Model,Journal of Econometrics, 177: 343- 256.
Gibson, H.D., S.G. Hall and G.S. Tavlas (2012), The Greek Financial Crisis: Growing Imbalances and Sovereign Spreads, Journal of International Money and Finance, 31: 498-516.
Krugman, P.R. (1998), What Happened to Asia?. Available on-line at: http://web.mit.edu/krugman/www/disinter.html
Masson, P.R. (1999), Contagion: Macroeconomic Models with Multiple Equilibria,Journal of International Money and Finance, 18: 587-602.
